trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Ocean City
There were no other sightings in Ocean City on or around November 3rd 2001
divs: sighting details at approximately 7pm 11\3\01 my wife and i heard alow flying jet aircraft circling our development. upon going outside to see whatwas going on, we only found the moon and stars and the sound of the circlingaircraft now in the distance. then we noticed a pulsing whitish blue light thecolor of the new car xenon beams. the light was flying erratic and low in thesky (it reminded me of the way a small bird or sparrow flys) and did a largecircle over the development.then about 7:05pm the jet aircraft was back andfollowing the light. the plane was low enough to actually see the aircraftilluminated by its green red and white lights,looked like an f-16. both airplaneand the light flew north east and went out of sight. 11\3\01 7:35 pmbyronanthony
